name: A Boy's Pet Rock
description:
My first game!

https://liluo.io/nutt3d/a-boy-s-pet-rock

Made for the GDevelop Game Jam #2

Clicking before the text finishes breaks the games, so do be careful.

Forgive me if it takes a minute to load, I haven't learned how to optimize at all.

You play a boy trying to defend his home along side his pet rock. There are multiple endings and hopefully I can get them all finished one day. I hope you all enjoy the game, it was a blast to learn with Gdevelop. Let me know if you spot anything that needs fixing!
